alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Lee; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 1:06AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Caldwell, eastern Guadalupe, southern Bastrop, Gonzales, south central Lee, southwestern Fayette and northern Wilson Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 106 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lockhart to near Stockdale. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seguin, Lockhart, Gonzales, Floresville, Luling, Smithville, Stockdale, Nixon, La Vernia, Waelder, Kingsbury, Smiley, New Berlin, Staples, Fentress, Cheapside, Sutherland Springs, Palmeto State Park, Rosanky and Pandora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for south central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bastrop; Caldwell; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Lee; Wilson
